description: The FileHandle interface defines all of the fields that are common to all implementations.

id.description: The ID of this FileHandle.  All references to this FileHandle will use this ID.  Synapse will generate this ID when the FileHandle is created.

etag.description: FileHandles are immutable from the perspective of the API.  The only field that can be change is the preivewId.  When a new previewId is set, the etag will change.

createdBy.description: The ID Of the user that created this file.

createdOn.description: The date when this file was uploaded.

concreteType.description: This is used to indicate the implementation of this interface. For example an S3FileHandle should be set to: org.sagebionetworks.repo.model.file.S3FileHandle

fileName.description: The short, user visible name for this file.
